  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(int number, Client client, double initialDeposit, boolean overdraft)
      This is the constructor for the Account class We have the following parameters in our constructor
      Parameters:
      number - references the client number
      client - references the constructor client
      initialDeposit - references the initial deposit of the client
      overdraft - references if the client is allowed to perform overdraft on the balance

    • getOperations

    • registerOperation

      public void registerOperation​(Operation operation)
